abstract: Swami Bhaktipada, 74, ex-Hare Krishna leader, died in Mumbai.
snippet: Swami Bhaktipada, 74, ex-Hare Krishna leader, died in Mumbai.
lead_paragraph: Swami Bhaktipada, 74, a former leader of the American Hare Krishna movement died on Monday in a hospital near Mumbai. He had built a sprawling golden paradise for his followers in the hills of Appalachia, but later pleaded guilty to federal racketeering charges that included conspiracy to commit the murders-for-hire of two devotees, this obituary in The New York Times says:

headline.main: Ex-Hare Krishna Leader Dies in Mumbai
